name: PRISM (itch)
description:
PRISM is a WIP solo project started on Monday, ‎June ‎27, ‎2016, at ‏‎7:53 PM, by Eliala. As of the current iteration, Eliala has dedicated over 400 hours of their time into PRISM. This narrative-driven JRPG follows Liana Ciel, an aspiring aeronaut living on the floating isle of Icarium and exploring the Sea of Sky aboard The Jetstream.

Help me find all the bugs and, if you're determined, find my friend Holes! All issue reports must include a screenshot!

Donate here and I will buy some art!

Visit my tumblr to message me and find updates!

You can also download on Steam

Controls
  • Arrow Keys - move/select
  • Q - current objective
  • X - menu/back
  • Z - interact/confirm
  • Z + Arrow Key - push/pull puzzle piece
  • Shift - skip text/run
  • F5 - fullscreen
  • F6 - cycle windowed size
Known Issues
  • None yet
